title: SimWorks USA Raffle for Los Angeles Wildfires Support
content:
SimWorks USA just kicked off a ten-day window in which you can purchase a raffle ticket for $20 each to benefit three crucial organizations. The brand will make the raffle drawing on February 17th, with 100% of all proceeds from the raffle ticket sales going to the GoFundMe Wildfire Relief Fund, American Red Cross, and Lowelifes Respectable Citizens Club…

The raffle prizes will include:

  • Doppo Ronin frameset (size of your choosing) along with $500 worth of SimWorks credit to help build it up.
  • Set of SimLoader bags in a color of your choosing
  • Good Vibes Coffee kit
  • Various SimWorks soft goods and merchandise
  • Gift card from our friends at Arium Botanicals here in Portland.

This raffle is open to entrants worldwide and the prizes can be shipped worldwide. Entrants will also receive via e-mail, a discount code for use in the SimWorks web store for a future purchase. This mail will go out after the raffle ticket purchasing window has closed at noon PST, Monday, February 17

Additionally, SimWorks is hosting a fundraising party on the evening of February 14, 3-6 PM, at its newly opened showroom space in Portland, OR. Attendees will be able to shop SimWorks products on-site at discounted prices, and food and refreshments will be served. All attendees are asked to purchase at least (1) one raffle ticket in advance or at the door.

Purchase a ticket at SimWorks USA.

SimWorks USA Showroom
2801 NW Nela St.
Portland, OR 97210
